argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvs.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvs.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvs.6 | |- N = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_nvs | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ -u 1 e. CC /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( -u 1 S A ) ) = ( ( abs ` -u 1 ) x. ( N ` A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( -u 1 S A ) ) = ( ( abs ` -u 1 ) x. ( N ` A ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ax1cn | |- 1 e. CC |
| 8 | 7 | #P_absnegi | |- ( abs ` -u 1 ) = ( abs ` 1 ) |
| 9 |  | #P_abs1 | |- ( abs ` 1 ) = 1 |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtri | |- ( abs ` -u 1 ) = 1 |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( abs ` -u 1 ) x. ( N ` A ) ) = ( 1 x. ( N ` A ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 3 | #P_nvcl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_mulid2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( 1 x. ( N ` A ) ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( abs ` -u 1 ) x. ( N ` A ) ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 16 | 6, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` ( -u 1 S A ) ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
